text: Sodom is a German thrash metal band formed in 1981 based out of Gelsenkirchen. They are seen as part of the "Big Four" of Teutonic thrash metal, along with Kreator, Destruction and Tankard. Sodom was a major influence on the German black metal scene, and is seen as a pioneer of death metal. ==Members== ===Current line-up=== *Tom Angelripper – bass , vocals *Frank "Blackfire" Gosdzik – guitars, *Yorck Segatz – guitars *Toni Merkel – drums ===Former members=== *Christian "Witchhunter" Dudek – drums *Frank Testegen – vocals, guitars *Rainer Focke – drums *Josef "Grave Violator" Dominic – guitars *Michael "Destructor" Wulf – guitars *Uwe Christophers – guitars *Uwe Baltrusch – guitars *Michael Hoffman – guitars *Andy Brings – guitars *Guido Richter – drums *Dirk Strahlmeier – guitars *Bernd "Bernemann" Kost – guitars *Bobby Schottkowski – drums *Markus "Makka" Freiwald – drums *Stefan "Husky" Hüskens – drums ==Discography== * Obsessed by Cruelty (1986) * Persecution Mania (1987) * Agent Orange (1989) * Better Off Dead (1990) * Tapping the Vein (1992) * Get What You Deserve (1994) * Masquerade in Blood (1995) * 'Til Death Do Us Unite (1997) * Code Red (1999) * M-16 (2001) * Sodom (2006) * The Final Sign of Evil (2007) * In War and Pieces (2010) * Epitome of Torture (2013) * Decision Day (2016) * Genesis XIX (2020) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Sodom at Encyclopaedia Metallum Category:1980s establishments in Germany Category:1981 establishments in Europe Category:German heavy metal bands Category:Thrash metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 1981 Category:Musical quartets Category:Musicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:People from Gelsenkirchen Category:1980s German music groups Category:1990s German music groups Category:2000s German music groups Category:2010s German music groups
